block_text.room_desc:
Rooms feature canopy beds, cool tile floors and wooden furnishings. They are equipped with cable TV, a mini-bar and coffee/tea making amenities. The private bathroom comes with shower facilities, toiletries and a hairdryer. The French doors lead out to the private open-air terrace offering views of the calming nature.

No extra bed can be accommodated.

block.mealplan: Breakfast is included in the room rate.

block_text.room_desc: Villas feature canopy beds, cool tile floors and wooden furnishings. They are equipped with a cable TV, mini-bar and coffee/tea making facilities. The private bathroom comes with a bathtub, shower facilities, toiletries and a hairdryer. Villas feature a spacious private balcony with it's own garden and unobstructed nature views. Connecting rooms are available, allowing for private use of an entire villa, each with a garden area.

action_modal.details: For bookings made on or after April 6, 2020, be sure to consider the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) and associated government measures. If you dont book a flexible rate, you may not be entitled to a refund. Your cancellation request will be handled by the property, based on your chosen policy and consumer law where applicable. During times of uncertainty, we recommend booking an option with free cancellation. If your plans change, you can cancel free of charge until free cancellation expires.
action_modal.title: Check your booking conditions

banner.subtitle: We recommend booking an option with free cancellation in case your travel plans change.
banner.title: As of April 6, 2020, your chosen cancellation policy will apply, regardless of the coronavirus.

hotel_text.important_information:
Please note that the property does not offer elevators. Guests who require mobility assistance are kindly requested to inform the hotel in advance, so that a more convenient room can be arranged.

===
The local authorities have imposed a tax of VND 20,000 per person for all visitors coming to Nui Sam area.

policies.content: You can cancel free of charge until 3 days before arrival. You'll be charged the total price of the reservation if you cancel in the 3 days before arrival. If you dont show up you will be charged the total price of the reservation.

All children are welcome. One child under 6 years stays free of charge when using existing beds.
One child from 6 to 12 years is charged VND 528750  per night when using existing beds.
One older child or adult is charged VND 828050  per night in an extra bed.
The maximum number of extra beds in a room is 1.
The maximum number of total guests in a room is 4.
There is no capacity for cribs in the room.
Any type of extra bed is upon request and needs to be confirmed by management.
Additional fees are not calculated automatically in the total cost and will have to be paid for separately during your stay.
WiFi is available in all areas and is free of charge.
Free private parking is available  on site (reservation is needed).
You'll be charged a prepayment of the total price of the reservation in the 3 days before arrival.
The property reserves the right to pre-authorize credit cards prior to arrival.
10 % VAT is included. 5 % Service charge is included. A City tax is not applicable.
items: A City tax is not applicable.

messages: Check for travel restrictions. Travel might only be permitted for certain purposes, and touristic travel in particular may not be allowed.
info_banners.title: Coronavirus (COVID-19) support
